medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started last night as generalized discomfort and is now localized to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The patient also reports nausea and has vomited twice. No urinary symptoms, no change in stool habits, and no hematochezia/melena.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Iron deficiency anemia secondary to menorrhagia.
